type LoadItemsEventHandler = delegate of obj * LoadItemsEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The source of the event, a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列表控件包含项的集合。A list control contains a collection of items. 这些项属于 类。These items are of the class. 提供默认呈现时，列表控件 按其 属性表示。When providing default rendering, the list control represents a by its property. 在模板呈现中，模板可以呈现 或关联的数据绑定对象的任何所需属性。In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a or associated data-bound object. 如果项被数据绑定到 对象，则 会引发事件。If an item is data-bound to a object, the event is raised. 此时，处理程序可以 从任意表达式设置对象的属性。At this time, the handler can set properties of the object from arbitrary expressions. 为控件创建委托时，需要 标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate for a control, you identify the method that will handle the event. 当生成项事件时，控件将通知处理程序。The control notifies the handler when an item event is generated. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时都会调用事件处理程序。Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
